name: Outdoor Research Stormtracker Sensor Gloves - Women's
description: Pretty much the Swiss Army Knife of backcountry gloves, the StormTrackers have got you covered for ski touring and alpine and ice climbing. A WINDSTOPPER® membrane and tricot lining make it surprisingly warm for its low profile, that gives you excellent dexterity and tactility. It’s at its best in moderately cold and dry conditions.Gore-Tex Infinium™ with Windstopper softshell provides weather protection.Wicking lining keeps hands dry while working hard.Goat leather palm is durable and touchscreen-compatible.Elasticized wrist seals out the elements.Zippered gauntlet entry with gusset.Pull loop can be hooked with a carabiner.
